\/C:\/Users\/admin\/Desktop\/codepool\/_: Ionic React QR Code Scanner with Capacitor
基于Capacitor编写Ionic React二维码扫描应用
Ionic React QR Code Scanner with Capacitor
The article talks about how to build an Ionic React QR Code Scanner with Capacitor using the Dynamsoft Barcode Reader plugin.
本文讨论了如何使用Dynamsoft Barcode Reader的Capacitor插件构建一个Ionic React二维码扫描应用。
The article talks about how to build an Ionic React QR Code Scanner with Capacitor using the Dynamsoft Barcode Reader plugin.
The app runs on Android, iOS devices and browsers.
该应用程序可以在安卓、iOS设备和浏览器上运行。
The app runs on Android, iOS devices and browsers.

In the <g1>previous article</g1>, we've given a brief demonstration on how to use the <g2>capacitor-plugin-dynamsoft-barcode-reader</g2> to create a cross-platform QR code scanner using web technologies with Capacitor.
在<g1>上一篇文章</g1>中，我们简要演示了如何使用<g2>capacitor-plugin-dynamsoft-barcode-reader</g2>构建跨平台二维码扫描应用。

In the <g1>previous article</g1>, we've given a brief demonstration on how to use the <g2>capacitor-plugin-dynamsoft-barcode-reader</g2> to create a cross-platform QR code scanner using web technologies with Capacitor.
In this article, we are going to take a step further to create an <g3>Ionic React</g3> QR Code Scanner.
在本文中，我们将使用Ionic React来构建一个二维码扫描应用。
In this article, we are going to take a step further to create an <g3>Ionic React</g3> QR Code Scanner.
A preview of the final result:
A preview of the final result:
The app uses <g1>IonReactRouter</g1> to manage navigation.
The app uses <g1>IonReactRouter</g1> to manage navigation.
It has two pages: a home page and a scanning page.
它有两个页面：主页和扫描页面。
It has two pages: a home page and a scanning page.
At the home page, users can copy the scanning result to the clipboard and configure whether to scan QR code only and whether to enable continuous scanning.
在主页，用户可以将扫描结果复制到剪贴板，配置是否只扫描QR二维码，是否启用连续扫描。
At the home page, users can copy the scanning result to the clipboard and configure whether to scan QR code only and whether to enable continuous scanning.
At the scanning page, it can do the following:
在扫描页面，它可以执行以下操作：
At the scanning page, it can do the following:
The Capacitor plugin uses <g1>Dynamsoft Barcode Reader</g1> and <g2>Dynamsoft Camera Enhancer</g2> as its backend.
这个Capacitor插件基于<g1>Dynamsoft Barcode Reader</g1>和<g2>Dynamsoft Camera Enhancer</g2>实现。
The Capacitor plugin uses <g1>Dynamsoft Barcode Reader</g1> and <g2>Dynamsoft Camera Enhancer</g2> as its backend.

Create a QR code scanner component
Create a QR code scanner component
React is declarative while the plugin only has imperative APIs.
React是声明式的，但我们要用的插件只提供命令式API。
React is declarative while the plugin only has imperative APIs.
We need to create a QR code scanner component so that we can use the plugin in a declarative manner.
我们需要创建一个二维码扫描组件，以便以声明性的方式使用插件。
We need to create a QR code scanner component so that we can use the plugin in a declarative manner.
Here is the complete code of the component (the file is saved as <g1>src\components\QRCodeScanner.tsx</g1>):
以下是组件的完整代码（文件另存为<g1>src\components\ QRCodeScanner. tsx</g1>）：
Here is the complete code of the component (the file is saved as <g1>src\components\QRCodeScanner.tsx</g1>):
Here, we've created a functional component.
在这里，我们创建了一个函数式组件。
Here, we've created a functional component.
There are some points to notice.
There are some points to notice.

Since the plugin will create a native camera view behind the webview and set the background of the webview to transparent so that we can customize the UI, we only return
as a placeholder.

由于该插件将在WebView下方创建一个原生的摄像头视图，并将WebView的背景设置为透明，以便我们可以自定义UI，因此我们只将
作为占位符返回。

Since the plugin will create a native camera view behind the webview and set the background of the webview to transparent so that we can customize the UI, we only return
as a placeholder.
<g1>useEffect</g1> is used to monitor whether the component is mounted or updated.
<g1>useEffect</g1>用于监听组件是否挂载或更新。
<g1>useEffect</g1> is used to monitor whether the component is mounted or updated.
Some imperative APIs like <g1>setFocus</g1> are more suitable to be used in an imperative way, so they are not added as props of the component.
一些命令式API，如<g1>setFocus</g1>更适合以命令式方式使用，因此它们不作为组件的属性添加。
Some imperative APIs like <g1>setFocus</g1> are more suitable to be used in an imperative way, so they are not added as props of the component.
Create a Home page and a Scanner page
Create a Home page and a Scanner page
The navigation is managed using <g1>IonReactRouter</g1> in <g2>App.tsx</g2>.
The navigation is managed using <g1>IonReactRouter</g1> in <g2>App.tsx</g2>.
We need to set <g1>z-index</g1> for the <g2>IonApp</g2> since the scanner will display a full screen camera preview with absolute position which covers other elements.
我们需要为<g2>IonApp</g2>设置<g1>z-index</g1>，因为Web端的扫描界面将显示一个会覆盖其他元素的全屏元素，它是绝对位置定位的。
We need to set <g1>z-index</g1> for the <g2>IonApp</g2> since the scanner will display a full screen camera preview with absolute position which covers other elements.
In the home page, create a <g1>Start Scanning</g1> button and two checkboxes.
在主页中，创建一个<g1>Start Scanning</g1>按钮和两个复选框。
In the home page, create a <g1>Start Scanning</g1> button and two checkboxes.
When the <g1>Start Scanning</g1> button is pressed, it will navigate to the scanner page with the <g2>continuous scan</g2> and <g3>qrcodeonly</g3> props and an <g4>active</g4> property.
按下<g1>Start Scanning</g1>按钮时，它将导航到扫描页面，并传递<g2>continuous scan</g2>，<g3>qrcodeonly</g3>和<g4>active</g4>属性。
When the <g1>Start Scanning</g1> button is pressed, it will navigate to the scanner page with the <g2>continuous scan</g2> and <g3>qrcodeonly</g3> props and an <g4>active</g4> property.
If continuous scan is disabled, the scanner will return the barcode results to the home page if it detects barcodes.
如果禁用连续扫描，扫描页面将在检测到二维码时将码的结果返回主页。
If continuous scan is disabled, the scanner will return the barcode results to the home page if it detects barcodes.
We can display them in a list and make them copiable.
我们可以将它们显示在列表中，并使其可复制。
We can display them in a list and make them copiable.

在页面装载时初始化插件，并在页面卸载时停止扫描。

修改运行时设置以只扫描QR二维码
Modify the runtime settings to scan QR Code only
Dynamsoft Barcode Reader provides rich parameters to adjust its behavior and it is very convenient to modify it with a JSON template.
Dynamsoft Barcode Reader提供了丰富的参数来调整其行为。我们可以使用JSON模板，较方便地对其进行修改。
Dynamsoft Barcode Reader provides rich parameters to adjust its behavior and it is very convenient to modify it with a JSON template.

Add the onFrameRead and onPlayed listeners
Add the onFrameRead and onPlayed listeners

Add the <g1>onFrameRead</g1> listener which is triggered when barcodes are found and add the <g2>onPlayed</g2> listener which is triggered when the camera is opened, switched or its resolution changed.
添加读到条码时触发的<g1>onFrameRead</g1>监听器，以及摄像头状态切换时触发的<g2>onPlayed</g2>监听器。

Add the <g1>onFrameRead</g1> listener which is triggered when barcodes are found and add the <g2>onPlayed</g2> listener which is triggered when the camera is opened, switched or its resolution changed.
The listeners have to be removed when the page is unmounted.
注意在卸载页面时，需要移除监听器。
The listeners have to be removed when the page is unmounted.
绘制二维码高亮覆盖图
In <g1>continuous scan</g1> mode, we can draw QR code overlays to show which QR codes are detected.
在<g1>连续扫描</g1>模式下，我们可以绘制二维码高亮覆盖图，以显示检测到的二维码。
In <g1>continuous scan</g1> mode, we can draw QR code overlays to show which QR codes are detected.

我们可以使用SVG来实现这一功能，如何实现在<g1>之前一篇文章</g1>中有讨论过。
We can do this using SVG which has been discussed in a <g1>previous article</g1>.

The <g1>viewBox</g1> attribute should match the video frame size.
The <g1>viewBox</g1> attribute should match the video frame size.
We can get the size from the <g2>onPlayed</g2> event.
我们可以从<g2>onPlayed</g2>事件获取大小。

Add polygon and text SVG elements
添加Polygon多边形和Text文本SVG元素
Add polygon and text SVG elements
The barcode result has the following localization attributes which we can use to determine the location of the polygon and text elements:
插件返回的条码结果具有以下定位属性，可用于确定多边形和文本元素的位置：
The barcode result has the following localization attributes which we can use to determine the location of the polygon and text elements:
Another problem we need to handle is the rotation problem.
我们需要处理的另一个问题是旋转。
Another problem we need to handle is the rotation problem.
The natural image sensor's orientation is landscape while the device is often portrait.
图像传感器的默认方向是横向的，而设备通常是纵向的。
The natural image sensor's orientation is landscape while the device is often portrait.
The video frame is often rotated by 90 degress for display.
为了在屏幕上显示，视频帧通常需要旋转90度。
The video frame is often rotated by 90 degress for display.
The <g1>onFrameReadListener</g1> will return the barcode results as well as the orientation of the device and the rotation degrees of the frame.
<g1>onFrameRead</g1>事件将返回条码结果、设备的方向和帧的旋转角度。
The <g1>onFrameReadListener</g1> will return the barcode results as well as the orientation of the device and the rotation degrees of the frame.
We can use these info to handle rotatoin.
我们可以用这些信息来处理旋转。
We can use these info to handle rotatoin.
Switch viewBox's height and width if the device is portrait.
如果设备是纵向的，则颠倒viewBox的高度和宽度。
Switch viewBox's height and width if the device is portrait.
Update the localization results based on frame orientation and device orientation.
根据帧方向和设备方向更新定位结果。
Update the localization results based on frame orientation and device orientation.
The above functions will be run in the <g1>onFrameRead</g1> event.
上述函数在<g1>onFrameRead</g1>事件中执行。
The above functions will be run in the <g1>onFrameRead</g1> event.

The select will display a preset resolution list with an "ask" label prefix and an option which shows the current resolution with a "got" label prefix.
选择项将显示一个带有“ask”标签前缀的预设分辨率列表，以及一个带有“got”标签前缀的显示当前分辨率的选项。
The select will display a preset resolution list with an "ask" label prefix and an option which shows the current resolution with a "got" label prefix.

在<g1>onPlayed</g1>事件中，更新当前分辨率：
Update the current resolution label in the <g1>onPlayed</g1> event:
Use the <g1>resolution</g1> prop in the QR code scanner component to make it effective.
使用二维码扫描组件的<g1>resolution</g1>属性使其生效。

We can set up a scan region (or recognition area) to guide the user to aim the camera to the QR code.
我们可以设置扫描区域来引导用户将摄像头对准二维码。
We can set up a scan region (or recognition area) to guide the user to aim the camera to the QR code.

The plugin also has an API to set focus.
插件还有一个设置对焦的API。
The plugin also has an API to set focus.
The unit of x and y is percentage, ranging from 0.0 to 1.0.
x和y的单位是百分比，范围从0.0到1.0。
The unit of x and y is percentage, ranging from 0.0 to 1.0.
We can set up an onClick event to the overlay SVG element to set focus.
我们可以为SVG元素设置onClick事件来设置对焦的焦点。
We can set up an onClick event to the overlay SVG element to set focus.
If the user taps the screen, set focus, draw a polygon around the tapped point and delete it after 1.5 seconds.
如果用户点击屏幕，设置焦点，围绕点击点画一个多边形，并在1.5秒后将其删除。
If the user taps the screen, set focus, draw a polygon around the tapped point and delete it after 1.5 seconds.
There are other actions we can add to control the camera.
我们还可以添加其他操作来控制摄像头。
There are other actions we can add to control the camera.
We can use a floating action button to perform these actions.
可以使用浮动操作按钮来执行这些操作。
We can use a floating action button to perform these actions.
